mapper.insert: insert into hosinsa_reviewreply (rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate) values (seq_reviewreply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update hosinsa_reviewreply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from hosinsa_reviewreply where bno = #{bno}
